title: Dodge timer for not banning.
body:
You get not only thrown out of the game but also dodge timed for not banning in the experimental normal draft.....

Well at least now I know (I didn't even realize it was like that when I first cranked it on and the timer is so fucking short it's like, what's going on? A ban? Wait i'm banning? oh shit what do I ban......).

Anyway 1:30 to go till I can have another crack.
